trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the recipient of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is the XML Web service, the XML Web service client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否的接收方<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML Web 服务和 / 或 XML Web 服务客户端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to either an XML Web service method or a method of a proxy class to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>可以应用于 XML Web 服务方法或对 XML Web 服务代理类的方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the recipient(s) are specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，收件人指定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>属性</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify that an XML Web service method returns a SOAP header when an exception is thrown during its execution, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the method and set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property to Fault.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 XML Web 服务方法返回的 SOAP 标头，在其执行期间引发异常时，应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>到方法和集<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>属性设置为错误。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0 of the .NET Framework does not support the Fault value.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client when an exception is thrown by the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref>通过 XML Web 服务方法引发异常时发送到 XML Web 服务客户端。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref>发送到 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to both the XML Web service and the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref>发送到 XML Web 服务和 XML Web 服务客户端。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref>发送到 XML Web 服务客户端。
